data.title: Andrew Lane (film producer)
data.meta_description: Andrew Lane is an American film producer and director. Together with Wayne Crawford he co-produced the 1983 comedy Valley Girl starring Nicolas Cage in his first co-starring role. The two were responsible for producing several other films including Night of the Comet, Servants of Twilight, Mortal Passions, and Jake Speed.
data.text:
"Train Wreck (film)" redirects here. For the 2015 film, see Trainwreck (film).

Andrew Lane is an American film producer and director. Together with Wayne Crawford he co-produced the 1983 comedy Valley Girl starring Nicolas Cage in his first co-starring role.[1] The two were responsible for producing several other films including Night of the Comet, Servants of Twilight, Mortal Passions, and Jake Speed.
